root.name: Rival Realms
root.description: PC Requirements Windows 95/98/Me (Home Edition): Not Widows XP compatible; Pentium 90 (Min.), Pentium 166 (Rec.); 2x CD-ROM drive; 16MB RAM (Min.), 32MB (Rec.); SVGA graphics card (Min.); Windows compatible sound card; 70MB free hard drive space; Mouse Keyboard.
